io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Aurora.Effects

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Aurora.Effects
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.Effects
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora effects information.

      • setEffect

        public int setEffect(java.lang.String effectName)
              throws StatusCodeException,
                     StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                     StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException,
                     StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Sets the selected effect on the Aurora to the effect specified by effectName.
        Parameters:
        effectName - the name of the effect
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 404 Resource Not Found, 422 Unprocessable Entity)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException - if the effect effectName is not present on the Aurora controller
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if effectName is malformed
        StatusCodeException

      • setRandomEffect

        public int setRandomEffect()
                    throws StatusCodeException,
                           StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Sets a random effect based on the effects installed on the Aurora controller. This includes dynamic as well as Rhythm effects.
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 404 Resource Not Found)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

        a string array of all the effects
        Throws:

      • addEffect

        public int addEffect(Effect effect)
              throws StatusCodeException,
                     StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                     StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Uploads and installs the local effect effect to the Aurora controller. If the effect does not exist on the Aurora it will be created. If the effect exists it will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect to be uploaded
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 Unprocessable Entity)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if effect contains an invalid number of instance variables, or has one or more invalid instance variables (causing the JSON output to be invalid)
        StatusCodeException

                 throws StatusCodeException,

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 404 Resource Not Found, 422 Unprocessable Entity)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException - if the effect effectName is not present on the Aurora controller
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if effectName is malformed
        StatusCodeException

      • setPanelColor

        public int setPanelColor(Panel panel,
                         int red,
                         int green,
                         int blue,
                         int transitionTime)
                  throws StatusCodeException,
                         StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                         StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Sets the color of a single panel on the Aurora.
        Parameters:
        panel - the target panel
        red - the red RGB value
        green - the green RGB value
        blue - the blue RGB value
        transitionTime - the time to transition to this frame from the previous frame (must be 1 or greater)
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 UnprocessableEntityException)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if the panel is not found on the Aurora or if the red, green, or blue values are invalid (must be 0 < x < 255)
        StatusCodeException

                         int transitionTime)
                  throws StatusCodeException,

        Sets the color of a single panel on the Aurora.
        Parameters:
        panel - the target panel
        hexColor - the new hex color
        transitionTime - the time to transition to this frame from the previous frame (must be 1 or greater)
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 UnprocessableEntityException)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if the panel is not found on the Aurora or if the red, green, or blue values are invalid (must be 0 < x < 255)
        StatusCodeException

      • fadeToColor

        public int fadeToColor(int red,
                       int green,
                       int blue,
                       int duration)
                throws StatusCodeException,
                       StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                       StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Fades all of the panels to an RGB color over a perdiod of time.
        Parameters:
        red - the red RGB value
        green - the green RGB value
        blue - the blue RGB value
        duration - the fade time in hertz (10Hz = 1sec)
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 UnprocessableEntityException)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if the RGB values are outside of the range 0-255 or if the duration is negative
        StatusCodeException

      • fadeToColor

        public int fadeToColor(java.lang.String hexColor,
                       int duration)
                throws StatusCodeException,
                       StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                       StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Fades all of the panels to a hex color over a perdiod of time.
        Parameters:
        hexColor - the new hex color
        duration - the fade time in hertz (frames per second)
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 UnprocessableEntityException)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if the hex color is invalid or if the duration is negative
        StatusCodeException

      • getPlugins

        public Plugin[] getPlugins()
                    throws StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                           StatusCodeException
        Gets all the plugins/motions from the Aurora.
        Note: This method is slow.
        Returns:
        an array of plugins from the Aurora
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

      • writeEffect

        public int writeEffect(java.lang.String command)
                throws StatusCodeException,
                       StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                       StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        (This method works with JSON data)
        Uploads a JSON string to the Aurora controller.
        Calls the write effect command from the OpenAPI. Refer to it for more information about the commands.

        Commands:

        - add - Installs an effect on the Aurora controller or updates the effect if it already exists.
        - delete - Permanently removes an effect from the Aurora controller. - request - Requests a single effect by name.
        - requestAll - Requests all the installed effects from the Aurora controller. Note: this takes a long time, but returns a JSON string. If efficiency is important, use the getAllEffects() method.
        - display - Sets a color mode on the Aurora (used for previewing effects).
        - displayTemp - Temporarily sets a color mode on the Aurora (typically used for notifications of visual indicators).
        - rename - Changes the name of an effect on the Aurora controller.

        Parameters:
        command - the operation to perform the write with
        Returns:
        (200 OK, 204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 Unprocessable Entity)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if command is malformed or contains invalid effect options
        StatusCodeException
